content.rendered:
White Lion Procurement

Since 2020 White Lion Procurement has been a rising American sourcing and procurement service provider that offers sourcing services from emerging markets such as Mexico, India and Vietnam, although we have the expertise for sourcing for well known markets such as China and Hong kong, currently our offices are located in Mexico, The USA and China.

CONTACT US
VIEW SERVICES

WE ARE THE LEADERS IN CONSTRUCTIONS

We offer direct connection with factories and manufacturers around the world, we take care of supervising the quality, and comply with your supply chain needs so that the product may be in your hands. We have the ability to both, connect you with big manufacturing facilities and small manufacturers to fulfill your monthly orders. With our extensive knowledge of the market we obtain the best deals at the best price in record time, with minimal or zero tariffs, and fast cheap shipping.

+
Industry knowledgeable
+
Projects fulfilled
+
Manufacturers ready to produce
+
years of experience combined
MORE PROJECTS

We follow the 7 steps Procurement Process

  • Comprenhensive Sourcing
  • Factory Auditing
  • Supplier background verification
  • Risk Management Services
  • Quotations
  • Inspection
  • Production Follow up
  • Quality Control

ABOUT US

Mission

To offer more value in exchange of an out of factory based price, delivering the best quality for the best rate, and to establish long term win-win relationships with our clients and manufacturers worldwide

Vision

Trustworthines: We have strong morals and we are open, ethical, and just. People trust us to adhere to our word.

Values

Trustworthines: We have strong morals and we are open, ethical, and just. People trust us to adhere to our word.

Innovative Passion: We make things happen, We are continuously moving forward, innovating, and improving.

Commitment and Quality: What we do, we do well, satisfying our clients needs.

Servant Leadership: We believe in shaping the future and helping others to succeed.

North America

  • 60+ Factories
  • Technology including computers and Phones
  • High Tech Machinery
  • Wood and Tooling

Europe

  • 20+ Factories
  • Transport Equipment
  • Chemicals
  • Cars
  • Aircrafts

Africa

  • 13+ Suppliers
  • Gems
  • Fruits
  • Metal

Asia

  • 40+ Factories and Suppliers
  • Integrated Circuits
  • Smartphones
  • Plastic Products
  • Textiles

Latam

  • 300+ Factories
  • Metal
  • Cars
  • Textiles
  • Chemicals

JOIN US

Get to know and relate with one of the most solid networks on the world

We will get back to you with an offer
